Title: Basic Functions of Jianying for Video Editing
Content: Jianying is a user-friendly tool commonly used for video editing, especially for creating mixed edits. To start, gather your video materials and save them to your computer. Import these materials into Jianying by clicking the import button. Once imported, you can begin editing by muting the original audio if necessary. The basic editing process involves trimming the beginning and end of each video clip to keep only the most relevant parts. You can drag and drop the clips to arrange them in the desired order. Adjust the speed of the clips using the speed adjustment feature to ensure the video flows naturally. Additionally, you can modify the audio and visual elements to enhance the overall quality. By following these steps, you can create a cohesive and engaging video using Jianying.

Title: Enhancing Video with Effects and Music
Content: To make your video more engaging, you can add various effects and music. Start by selecting a suitable background music track that complements the video's theme. Import the music into Jianying and align it with the video clips. Adjust the duration of the music to match the length of the video. You can also add text, stickers, and other visual effects to highlight key points or add a creative touch. For smoother transitions between clips, use the transition effects available in Jianying. These effects help in making the video appear more professional and seamless. Remember, the goal is to enhance the video without making it look overly polished, as authenticity is valued on platforms like Xiaohongshu. By carefully selecting and applying these enhancements, you can create a visually appealing and engaging video.

Title: Creating Authentic Content for Xiaohongshu
Content: When creating content for Xiaohongshu, it's important to maintain authenticity. Overly professional videos may not resonate well with the audience on this platform. Instead, focus on making subtle edits that differentiate your video from the original while keeping it genuine. Simple modifications like adjusting the video length, adding basic effects, and incorporating relevant music can make your content stand out. Avoid making the video too polished; instead, aim for a natural and relatable feel. This approach helps in building trust with your audience and encourages higher engagement. By balancing quality with authenticity, you can create content that is both appealing and credible on Xiaohongshu.
